EmailTemplate.name: Marble - Quote Sold
EmailTemplate.subject: We Sold a Quote for {!Marble__c.Company_DBA__c}!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Zach,
Marble #{!Marble__c.Name} has a quote that has been accepted by the client. Please review and request the appropriate contract from the partner.
https://na33.salesforce.com/{!Marble__c.SFID__c}
Thanks!
